name: perl-io-compress
description: A perl library for uncompressing gzip, zip, bzip2 or lzop file/buffer.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-compress-raw-zlib
dependencies.description: A low-Level Interface to zlib compression library.

dependencies.name: perl-compress-raw-bzip2
dependencies.description: A low-Level Interface to bzip2 compression library.

dependent_to.name: kaiju
dependent_to.description:
Kaiju is a program for the taxonomic classification of high-throughput
sequencing reads.
